remarks: Value of the disjointified hom-set function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
homarcl.h $e |- H = ( HomA ` C ) $.
homafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
homafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
homaval.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` C ) $.
homaval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
homaval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
elhoma $p |- ( ph -> ( Z ( X H Y ) F <-> ( Z = <. X , Y >. /\ F e. ( X J Y ) ) ) ) $.
